name: Pathfinder: Gallowspire Survivors
description:
Pathfinder: Gallowspire Survivors is a new roguelite survivor game set in the beloved fantasy world of Pathfinder. Venture into Gallowspire, Pathfinder’s legendary tower of darkness, as one of three heroes — and alongside a fearless companion — on a doomed quest to seal away the greatest threat the world has ever known.





  • 3 hero classes: Fighter, Rogue, and Wizard, each with unique abilities and playstyles
  • Unlock 67+ different abilities and 36+ talents, all inspired by Pathfinder TTRPG
  • Fight 4 unique bosses in scripted and challenging battles
  • Face against 47+ unique monsters, and mini-bosses with over 275 variants
  • Complete 30+ quests
  • Battle through 16 floors showcasing 3 unique biomes
  • Deep replayability: 5 Difficulty levels for those seeking pain and suffering







You won’t have to face the darkness alone. Choose one of your other heroes to join your main hero as a companion while adventuring. They will stand alongside you on the battlefield, offering protection and firepower.






Absorb necromantic essence to find and enhance attacks and passives each run to grow stronger against Tar-Baphon's forces.

Use attribute points to increase Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma.

Upgrade your talent tree and get deeper customization options by unlocking new attacks and passive abilities






Explore dungeons, find hidden treasure chests, and let fate decide your fortune with d20 rolls. Use gold to upgrade potent consumables like healing potions and spell-like effects.






Support the independent team behind "Pathfinder: Gallowspire Survivors" as we craft a thrilling roguelite survivor experience.

Step into the beloved fantasy world of Pathfinder and prepare for an unforgettable journey.
